contentList.content: Your magic protects you from harm, making you resistant to all forms of damage. Incoming damage is reduced by [1].
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].

Flickering flames dance on your fingertips, a primal power yearning to be unleashed. You are not just a sorcerer, but a conduit, channeling the raw essence of fire into searing spells and devastating displays.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burned</LSTag>.

Infuse the weapon in your main hand with fire. The weapon becomes magical, preventing it from being disarmed. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>, and Damage Rolls, and deals an additional [2].

Weapon has become magical, preventing it from being disarmed. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag>, and Damage Rolls, and deals an additional [2].
Casting this spell using a 4th or 5th level spell slot will increase the Attack and Damage bonus to [1], and a 6th level spell slot will increase it to [2].
Your fire spells burn hotter, ignoring resistance, and dealing additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
You step through the hells, reappearing in another location.

Your fire spells burn as hot as the hells, overcoming resistance and immunity, and dealing additional damage equal to twice your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
